attributes.action: Only allow noiseless fireworks to be sold to general public
attributes.additional_details: when fireworks are available to general public they are on sale for weeks before November 5th celebrations and for weeks after.  The loud bangs do not only upset dogs but individuals with sensory issues and can make them extremely distressed even within the confines of their own homes.
attributes.background: I would like the government to take action to ask the manufacturer's of fireworks for general sale to the public to be noiseless.  They are already available to buy in Asda so if it could be made a blanket approach which is much easier to monitor

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition which calls for the same action:

Ban the sale of all non-silent fireworks: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/649354
